Name: Version 1.1
Description:
A minor update to the Word 2007 Redaction Tool. This version can be installed directly over any existing version.
!!!! Updates to Version 1.1
* Fixed bugs:
** Pictures in the header could cause redaction to hang, Find and Mark to fail to find, or Unmark All to fail to complete
** Merged table cells could cause redaction to fail
** Find Next fails to progress if the last redaction mark is in the last cell of a table in the last paragraph of the document
* Preventative update to ensure that no error can cause redaction to hang
!!!! Prerequisites
The following items are required:
* The .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1
* The VSTO 3.0 Runtime Service Pack 1
If either of these items are not installed, Setup will download and install them automatically, *but a reboot may be required*.
!!!! Important Notes
* *+This add-in is not officially supported by Microsoft+*; however, the source code is available so it can be viewed and modified (please consult the [url:License|http://www.codeplex.com/redaction/license] tab if you have any questions on licensing).
* We recommend that you carefully review any documents redacted using this tool to confirm that all the information that you intended to redact was successfully redacted.

Name: Version 1.0
Description:
The initial release of the Word 2007 Redaction Tool. This version can be installed directly over the Beta (if you have it).
!!!! New to Version 1.0
* Find and Mark - allows for all instances of a specific string to be marked at once
* Various bug fixes
!!!! Prerequisites
The following items are required:
* The .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1
* The VSTO 3.0 Runtime Service Pack 1
If either of these items are not installed, Setup will download and install them automatically, *but a reboot may be required*.
!!!! Important Notes
* *+This add-in is not officially supported by Microsoft+*; however, the source code is available so it can be viewed and modified (please consult the [url:License|http://www.codeplex.com/redaction/license] tab if you have any questions on licensing).
* We recommend that you carefully review any documents redacted using this tool to confirm that all the information that you intended to redact was successfully redacted.

Description:
The initial beta release of the Word 2007 Redaction Tool. This release is functionally complete and Setup should work, but might still have a couple rough edges.

Name: Version 1.2
Description:
A minor update to the Word 2007 Redaction Tool. This version can be installed directly over any existing version.
!!!! Updates to Version 1.2
* Fixed bugs:
** Documents with "Update styles to match template" change formatting when redacted
** Field codes should be removed from redacted documents
* Updated redaction formatting to use text highlighting instead of background shading
!!!! Prerequisites
The following items are required:
* The .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1
* The VSTO 3.0 Runtime Service Pack 1
If either of these items are not installed, Setup will download and install them automatically, *but a reboot may be required*.
!!!! Important Notes
* *+This add-in is not officially supported by Microsoft+*; however, the source code is available so it can be viewed and modified (please consult the [url:License|http://www.codeplex.com/redaction/license] tab if you have any questions on licensing).
* We recommend that you carefully review any documents redacted using this tool to confirm that all the information that you intended to redact was successfully redacted.
